channel.title: CVE Feed for aaextention -- AA Cash Calculator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for aaextention -- AA Cash Calculator

item.title: CVE-2024-0848|2024-06-04T17:59:09.732Z -- aaextention -- aa%20cash%20calculator
item.description: The AA Cash Calculator plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘invoice’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
